sentences: Tööl põhinev õpetusviis oli 1920-ndail aastail populaarne.
Lapsed said tööl teha mitmesugaseid ülesandeid.
Kool kasutas töö meetodit õpilaste iseseisvuse arendamiseks.
context: The word 'tööl' in Estonian refers to a work-based or project-based educational approach that was popular in the 1920s. It emphasizes independent student work and hands-on activities rather than traditional teacher-centered instruction.
